title: NIMHANS Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Technical Coordinator Posts
description: The National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Technical Coordinator Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the application deadline. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech and MCA can apply for the NIMHANS Notification 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age...
